BasicDetails.Title: 30 WILFORD LN
BasicDetails.Description: This property is almost a half acre and completely flat.This is zoned for residential multi units per the City of Cotati. Great location, close to downtown. A contractors dream. Please do your own research with the City of Cotati.

BasicDetails.Title: 225 ROSE AVENUE
BasicDetails.Description: Build TWO homes in Cascade Canyon! Mill Valley, not county. 30min from SF. Views that would inspire Ansel Adams! This double parcel includes 3 lots: APN 027-252-06, 027-252-05 & 027-252-04. Utilities at property line. Plans approved but expired for 2 homes, each with a LEGAL 2nd UNIT. Build a family compound or two separate properties. Architect has done homes on this street and, if desired, could consult on the process.

BasicDetails.Title: 2457 MAR E STREET

Located in the coveted Mar East neighborhood, this home includes tranquil outdoor spaces, 3 garages, additional off street parking and a 470sf bonus room perfect for additional storage, an office, a gym, or a music room.

BasicDetails.Title: 318 D STREET

New cabinets and granite counters. High ceilings, crown molding and ceiling fans throughout. Baths with tile floors and tubs. Fireplace with tile decor. New flooring, double pane windows, water heater, and paint throughout. Large basement below the home. Newly landscaped yard.

BasicDetails.Title: 5185 FULTON ROAD

Currently, one 2 bedroom, one bathroom home on property. Family room with fireplace. Barn on property. Lots of land for gardening, livestock, or running a business.

BasicDetails.Title: 1413 CASA BUENA DRIVE
BasicDetails.Description: Price Reduced! Not a Drive By- Must See! Turn key. Unique multi level, 2645 sf, remodeled home on over 1/2 acre lot- 4+ BR, 2.5 BA & Bonus Rm. Vaulted ceilings in LR/DR. Fireplace, skylights, large windows, lots of light. New engineered hardwood and tile floors. Chef's Kitchen Qrtz counters, Wolf, Thermadore, Bosch appliances w/adj breakfast room. Generous MBR & spa like MBA. Fab yard, Waterfall, patio, decks, grass and mature trees and garden.

BasicDetails.Title: 1 SHORES COURT

Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac, it is centrally located near theatre, restaurants, shopping and the wonderful weekly Civic Center Farmer's Market. A glorious lagoon is nearby with wonderful paths to take a stroll.

BasicDetails.Title: 200 DEER VALLEY ROAD 1J

This ground floor unit with its lovely outdoor patio is adjacent to the main Clubhouse and administration building for easy access to all amenities and activities.Featuring one large bedroom and master bathroom, adjacent den with two sided fireplace, second full bathroom, spacious rooms, granite kitchen, newer appliances and much more! Call for details!

Build TWO homes or one street-to-street parcel for family compound or ultra-luxury estate.

BasicDetails.Title: 249 JOHNSTONE DRIVE

Lots of extra parking. Close to open space, coveted Dixie Schools. Neighborhood park & comm.ctr.

BasicDetails.Title: 205 SAN MARINO DRIVE

BasicDetails.Title: 57 PASEO WAY

BasicDetails.Title: 720 PETALUMA BOULEVARD 21

Large formal living room with high ceilings, FP, and wall of arched windows for light & view. Paneled office with boxed ceiling and walls of shelves. Gourmet kitchen with huge island w/sink, updated appliances, Sub zero, trash compactor, desk, walk in pantry as well as a Butler pantry and informal eating area. Open to the kitchen is the huge FR with wall of shelves, FP, French door to slate patio and well equipped wet bar with ref and wine ref. Master BR w/FP, and French door to patio. Mst bath w/dual sinks, dual shower heads, jetted tub and bidet, walk in closet. One en-suite BR and two with Jack & Jill bath. Refrigerated 450 bottle wine cellar w/sink. LG schools.

BasicDetails.Title: 24685 Heather HTS
BasicDetails.Description: Looking for a little peace and quiet? Here it is! A 10 +/- acre Lot with a 4140 +/- SF, 4/5 Bedroom Executive style home. Located in a private gated community just 20 minutes from the Village of Saratoga. All bedrooms have views. Living/Family Rooms on different levels for your enjoyment. Master Bedroom on main level. Kitchen leads to 60 foot long deck great for entertaining! Come See! Distinguished Saratoga Schools!

BasicDetails.Title: 198 1st ST
BasicDetails.Description: Stunning, one of a kind, custom built home designed by Jack McCarthy and built by James Camozzi in 2007. This well cared for home is located across from Golden Gate National Recreation Area with beautiful unobstructed views of the ocean, Montara State Beach and Devils Slide. Steps from your front door is the beach and access to mountain trails. Just minutes to Pacifica and San Francisco. The home has beautiful Brazilian cherry wood floors, a chef's dream kitchen with stainless appliances including Miele dishwasher, 6 burner gas stove with grill, wine fridge, and large walk-in pantry with a formal dining room allowing access to the back patio. Soaring ceilings take full advantage of the views from both levels. 4 bed/3 bath home offers 1 bed & bath on the main level, all others up including spacious master suite with an ocean and mountain view balcony, spa like bathroom with walk-in shower, double sinks, walk-in closet, beautiful jetted soaker tub. Don't let this dream home pass you by.

BasicDetails.Title: 225 Del Mesa Carmel

Remodeled spacious light bright "A" model ...level floor plan comprised of Two bedrooms and Two full baths. Elegant Hardwood floors throughout, Gourmet kitchen, Contemporary baths. Sun swept west facing Verandah with views of Lawn Bowling Greens, Putting Green and Santa Lucia mountains beyond. Short stroll to Club House, Restaurant, Fitness Center, Pool & Spa just a few of the so many amenities. Del Mesa 55+ Adult community set high on a peaceful & serene hillside at the mouth of Carmel Valley with its breathtaking views. Enjoy peace, serenity & security of this 24/7 Guard gated community... Savor valley sunshine and coastal breezes this truly is a lifestyle like no other on the Monterey Peninsula !!!

BasicDetails.Title: 115 Quail Hollow DR
BasicDetails.Description: Lovely home with 2 Bds & 2 Baths. Separate Family Room, Light and Bright Living Room. Updated with Laminate Floors and New Carpet. New Interior Paint. Low Space Rent. Good Location in Community. Seniors (55+) Mobile Home Community. Close to Shops, Transportation and Parks.

BasicDetails.Title: 14190 Palomino WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Ready to Build. Fantastic Design. Great Location. Easy Access Saratoga Schools. 78,000+ sq. ft. parcel, very gently sloped, lots of usable space. Building Permit issued by City of Saratoga for 6700+ sq ft home. 5 bedrooms (all suites) and 6.5 bathrooms. Innovative open floor plan. Gorgeous panoramic views from living room, which overlooks large infinity pool. Perfect for luxury living and great for entertaining!

BasicDetails.Title: 1010 Rodeo RD
BasicDetails.Description: An outstanding combination of uncompromising construction quality and unobstructed views, this Front Line Shore Course home is a marvel of quality, space, & design. With views from every room, this reconstructed, enhanced & customized masterpiece was designed with the ocean, golf course and livability in mind. Offering almost 4700 SF of interior living space and another 1,900 SF of ocean view terraces and patios, this home gives you the feel of living in your view while enjoying the luxury of your surroundings inside. Accessorized with exquisite materials of wood, stone & glass, from living room to bedrooms to balconies, this home creates one of the most incredible living environments of all time. An over-sized garage, double the normal closet space, & customized audio/visual system in each room are just a few of the details that you will find that make this home a never ending surprise of features and design. No longer buildable in size, truly a remarkable ocean view home .

BasicDetails.Title: 16500 Cypress WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Substantial Price Reduction! All this for a GREAT PRICE! Views & more Views! Framed by a canopy of oaks w/ city light & mtn views from most rooms, this lovely property creates a calm & peaceful ambience. Private natural beauty-4 bed/3 bath home on an over one acre parcel. Ideal for comfortable living & entertaining, property boasts expansive picture windows that showcase the incredible views of the surrounding landscape & entire valley. As you enter the foyer, the dramatic great room captures attention with beautiful limestone floors and the walls of windows that bring the natural landscape to you. Enjoy the bright and open kitchen w/ Italian marble slab counters & top of the line appliances. Ample white glazed cabinetry and access to the private rear yard, perfect for gatherings or al fresco dining. Take in the tree tops views from the Master Suite loft with private balcony. A truly special property and only minutes to downtown Los Gatos and award winning Los Gatos Schools!

BasicDetails.Title: 18478 Twin Creeks RD
BasicDetails.Description: Quintessential California Living in a French Country style home. Significantly expanded and remodeled in 2007. New pool and backyard landscaping in 2014. Large gourmet Kitchen with professional grade Viking oven range, granite counter, stainless appliances and two large skylight and tons of storage. Spacious eat-in area that has easy access to the pool. Large master suite upstairs with sitting area and private office with vaulted ceiling and skylight. 4 bedrooms downstairs with two full baths. Full bath off kitchen and pantry for easy access to pool. Two HVAC systems, water heater with recirc pump. Much, much more....

BasicDetails.Title: 14 Lismore LN
BasicDetails.Description: This spectacular country property behind the gates in Sleepy Hollow offers a unique opportunity to enjoy acres of cultivated, leveled pastures for horses to run and your eyes roam. Charming and cozy, the two bedroom cottage is a wonderful romantic retreat with a covered porch, quaint gardens and outdoor dining and fireplace areas. Close by are four stalls and a tack room for your favorite horses and a substantially finished 8 car barn for your favorite automobiles. Offering an opportunity to enjoy as it is or plan a more stately manor, this property is rare in its offering, unique in its opportunity and inspiring in its setting. Property is serviced by public water (CA) the Sleepy Hollow water system and a private well permitted in 2000 County Verified water test of over 14 GPM.

BasicDetails.Title: 4980 Southside RD
BasicDetails.Description: Magnificent modern. Award winning architecture and vintage outbuildings on 5.54 acres with 2 private wells. Soaring open beam Ceilings, Multiple french doors, natural wood built-in's, books case's, window seats, dressers, casings & doors. This incredible home has 4 bedrooms, (a large master suite on first floor) . 3 beautiful bathrooms . The kitchen has a cold rolled steel kitchen floor. Island with 2nd sink and stainless steel appliances. Colored concrete counters, stainless steel backsplash with natural light transom. Beautiful hardwood floors. A partial basement wine cellar. Diamond plate steel stairs that lead to the upstairs loft area, with balcony. Don't miss the covered patio with Fireplace, BBQ area . The Storage: 2 Car detached garage, with Workshop. 5 Car port and Artist studio, Covered parking of approx. 40 X 70, A barn of approx 37 X 55. 2 Access roads. 40 Olive trees and let's not forget 100 year old lemon tree. Views of the surrounding orchards, hills and valley.

BasicDetails.Title: 25400 La Loma DR

Close to major transportation routes (Less than 5 minutes to 280 and less than 10 minutes to downtown LA) downtown Los Altos, and great schools. BasicDetails.Title: 323 Nevada AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Dramatic white water views and sunsets from the quintessential beach house! Overlooking the Fitzgerald Marine Reserve; steps from the beach and coastal trails! Bring the kids, bring the dog, and bring your binoculars. The whales are often playing just offshore! Stunning finishes inside include leathered granite, copper farmers sink, Thermador 6 burner range, Bosch DW, glass tiled backsplash, custom cabinets & vanities with glass vessel sinks, open glass shower surround, huge laundry w/custom counters & cabinets, solid core doors throughout, radiant heat in baths. Custom entry door. Lower level includes additional living area, sauna, BR & Bath which could be a fantastic in-law suite or rental with separate entrance & view of the the garden and ocean. This perfect private sanctuary with bubbling fountains, garden sculpture, pergola and decking, is an amazing place to relax, restore, and get your Zen on, or to entertain clients and friends while you watch the sun set over the Pacific!

BasicDetails.Title: 5106 Selinda WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Wow! Over 3200 sqft for $1.750m! Great neighborhood plus sits at the end of cul de sac, this quiet and convenient property is close to the excellent neighborhood schools and shopping! Spacious, open floor plan with vaulted ceilings and lots of light streams through the interior! 4 generous bedrooms with one the main floor w/ adjacent full bath has a murphy bed. Love the spacious master suite w/ sitting area and fireplace, walk-in closet and overlooking the surrounding hills. What a master bath! Large vanity area, jetted tub and separate shower. Overlooking rear yard and large deck, the kitchen offers ample cabinetry, solid surface countertops and opens to a comfortable family room area. Vaulted ceilings and high windows light up the living room and dining room area w/ wet bar! Spacious 3 car garage. Solar panels provide a huge electric savings every month. Prime neighborhood schools: Alta Vista Elementary API score 951, Union Middle API score 938 and Leigh HS API score 833!

BasicDetails.Title: 38325 Tassajara RD
BasicDetails.Description: This is the place for your next adventure. Carmel Lavender farm is a thriving lavender business and a honey business. Included in the sale are almost 20 acres of beautifully forested land, lavender fields, apiaries and vegetable gardens. There is a home, distillery, honey house, storage facilities, chicken coop and a tiny house for guests. The tiny house is completely off the grid, run by solar panels with battery back-up. If you ever wanted to explore a thriving agritourism business and live and work at home then this just might be what you are looking for. There is opportunity to expand the current business and farming activities. Experience all that mother nature can provide - beautiful views, opportunity to grow crops and earn money. Swing from the old swing under the white oak, gaze at the stars, take a dip in the pool. Relax and read while distilling your lavender. Minutes from Carmel Valley Village, Carmel, Pebble Beach and all that the Monterey Peninsula has to offer.

BasicDetails.Title: 2643 Walker AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Step through the rose trellis of the arched front gate onto a lush & colorful garden pathway to your own private country cottage. The gently warm tones, open beam pitched ceilings, skylights, expansive multi-pained window and French doors all invite the coastal light in. There is an upstairs bedroom/office, but all other rooms are located on one level. Beautifully remodeled kitchen with top of the line appliances, new bathrooms, new roof, new paint, refinished hardwood floors and much more. This 6,700 square foot lot is fully fenced and private with a small detached art studio,office or children's' playhouse.

BasicDetails.Title: 16770 Redwood Lodge RD
BasicDetails.Description: Uniquely zoned Parks and Recreation which means it can be used in many ways. In the past it was a Naturist Center, a venue for weddings, a retreat center, a place for holding classes and conferences in the large room overlooking the forest and a place where families could hold reunions and reconnect. Total 27 acres. It has a year round creek running through it and provides water for a neighboring community Mutual Water Company. There are currently 9 cabins on the property (2 w/fireplaces, all w/toilets), three duplex sleeping cabins (a total of 6 separate spaces), a pool (currently not in use), a hot tub that seats 20, a stage area with pavilion, a conference room (150 occupancy), a kitchen with a walk-in fridge, commercial stove and oven and room for three tables (each seats six), plenty of parking, large grassy areas, chicken coop and owners living space. Its future use depends on you and your dreams. This is your chance to own a piece of history in the Santa Cruz Mountains.

BasicDetails.Title: 21622 Bertram RD
BasicDetails.Description: If you are looking for a tranquil setting or unique paradise and want to get away from the hectic hustle and bustle of Silicon Valley - THIS IS IT! Single story home surrounded by redwoods in private, serene setting on enormous lot. Relax on the expansive front deck that opens to stunning views of hills and trees. 3bd, 2ba plus bonus room. Home has new carpet and flooring, new interior and exterior paint. Newer garage door and roof, recessed lights, lots of built in shelving, large master with walk in closet. Two car garage with racetrack flooring. Enclosed English garden with grow lights for vegetables plus additional planters on deck. Seating area in back of home has outdoor built in grill. This home is perfect for outdoor entertaining on the massive front all redwood deck. Located in historic New Almaden, Home is close to upscale La Foret French Restaurant, Quicksilver Park, hiking trails. Top schools Graystone Elementary, Bret Harte Middle, and Leland High.

BasicDetails.Title: 2805 Champs Elysee BLVD
BasicDetails.Description: Brand new Storybook Builders. West side Miramar. Construction to begin September, 2016, completion Spring, 2017. A reverse floorplan allows for views. Living room, family room, kitchen and dining rooms are all connected with large openings and views. This home is just waiting for your first visitors; the more the merrier. 2.29 +/- rolling acres. A small portion of the vineyard you see is part of the property. 3 neighbors contribute land to the vineyard, one of the neighbors makes the wine and share the product.

BasicDetails.Title: 7253 Gold Creek WAY

Just one block to Quicksilver Park trail-head and miles of trails!

Additional square footage below grade possible, buyer to verify with the City of Palo Alto. Excellent schools (Buyer to verify specific schools availability).

Laundry room with sink, storage, and laundry drop from upstairs. Park-like backyard with multiple eating areas, raised planters and running pond water feature. Entertaining at it's best! Total privacy.

Stunning guest house with 2-story living room, garden views, one bedroom, 1 full bath and guest bath. Magnificent and premier location.

The master bedroom also features a large walk-in closet. All 4-berooms and laundry room, equipped with a brand new washer and dryer are all on the second level along with a study area with a built-in desk with drawers. BasicDetails.Description: Great single family home with beautiful views! Living/dining with large window & hardwood floors. Kitchen with gas stove and nice city views. Two bedrooms (Jack 'n Jill) and one bathroom located on the living level. Two rooms (unwarranted) & one bathroom in garage, great for in-law or guest suite, office or playroom. Sunny home with great views and flexible floor plan. Secure entry, hardwood floors & nice backyard filled with trees. Close to Bart, easy access to transportation, walk to school, parks & shopping.

BasicDetails.Title: 3012 Via Del Sol
BasicDetails.Description: Great starter home! 4 spacious bedrooms and 2 full baths. Original hardwood floors in family room, kitchen has been updated with new counter tops, and appliances. Cozy fireplace in Living room with slider door to the backyard. Laundry room has full size washer and dryer. Two car garage with extra storage. Newer furnace. Backyard has patio and mature trees. Close proximity to North Valley shopping/dining/freeways. A must see!

BasicDetails.Title: 50 Mounds RD 209
BasicDetails.Description: Gorgeous views from this very spacious, light and bright one level condo. Located in a desirable "Top Of the Mounds" community, this home is immaculate, warm and inviting. Formal entry. Large kitchen boasts beautiful Corian counters, white cabinets, electric cooktop, double oven, pantry and tile flooring. Plantation shutters throughout. A spacious living room with a fireplace and wet bar opens onto a large balcony. Relax and enjoy spectacular views of the Bay and the mountains. Lovely formal dining room. Abundance of closet space, including three closets in each bedroom and a mirrored door closet in a hallway. Marble floors in a master bathroom with a stall shower and bathtub. Delightful community amenities feature 24/7 doorman, social room/library, exercise room, pool, spa, sauna, and guest suites. Individual two car garage. A very special, elegant place to live!

BasicDetails.Title: 529 Sycamore ST
BasicDetails.Description: Wonderfully situated near down town San Carlos, public transportation, schools and parks, this two bedroom, two bathroom home also includes a large family room and an office. This traditional home is located on a quiet street, yet enjoys easy access to the amenities of this vibrant community. The beautiful original random-plank hardwood floors set the tone for this spacious and comfortable home. On the entry level, the gracious formal living and dining rooms enjoy pleasant vistas, including city lights and the East Bay hills over the Bay. The large eat-in kitchen offers informal dining options. One bathroom, two bedrooms and the office complete the main level of the home. The lower level includes the large family room, laundry room and the second bathroom. This also features a separate entrance to the rear yard and garage. Large closets and ample storage are found throughout the home.

BasicDetails.Title: 1002 Lakeview WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Emerald Hills convenience. Easy access to Farm Hill & 280. Views of East Bay hills, SF Bay & Linda Lake. The 2nd level deck offers up magnificent sunsets and star-gazing. Cul-de-sac location with lake-front estate style homes. In addition to 2 car garage and lower driveway parking, the upper driveway area can accommodate a boat, RV or both! Entry level en-suite bedroom. 10 minutes to downtown Redwood City with its vibrant theater and restaurant scene. First available for viewing at the Saturday 1:30 open house.

BasicDetails.Title: 659 Joanne DR
BasicDetails.Description: Mid century modern, an Eichler, that has had many improvements done! Foam Roof, dual paned windows and flooring just 2 years ago, new exterior paint & some landscaping these last couple of weeks plus many other "little" things that add up to making this a great place to call home. Only one of 12 houses in 19th Ave park with a front door facing the street (according to the long term neighbors) & backing to the creek which offers extra privacy. Large patio in the rear with 3 sliding glass doors to access it & the rest of the yard just make the house glow with light. Family room area off the main living space, fireplace and lots of storage spaces. This neighborhood boasts great schools, Sunnybrae, Borel and Aragon, its own little park, easy access to highway 92 and walking distance to a shopping center with Trader Joes, Rite Aid, Ross & TJ Max to name a few. Don't miss the chance to live in this coveted mid century modern home. Come see some ideas on how to make it even better too!

BasicDetails.Title: 14300 Saddle Mountain DR
BasicDetails.Description: In a magical setting on a rolling hilltop with panoramic views, this residence blends clean-lined contemporary style with the romance of a Tuscan villa and is exquisitely designed to provide effortless enjoyment of a seamlessly integrated indoor/outdoor environment.Throughout the home, huge banks of windows and walls of floor-to-ceiling glass frame stunning hillside views and blur the line between the spacious interiors and the striking exterior entertainment spaces. While wonderful curving lines throughout create intimate window-lined niches for dining and reading in the living areas, vast wraparound terraces and a shimmering infinity lap pool with spa beckon al fresco recreation. Every space is enhanced by the finest custom finishes handmade exclusively for this home, including polished granite, travertine marble, rich wood cabinetry, and hardwood floors. The convenient and scenic location boasts views of the surrounding hillsides and the sparkling city lights of Silicon Valley.

BasicDetails.Title: 156 Springdale WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Stunning contemporary home with versatile, open floor plan, high ceilings, large living space, loads of windows with panoramic valley and bay views. A large cook's kitchen with granite countertops opens to an expansive, natural light-filled great room with a gas-light, wood burning stone fireplace - perfect for entertaining and family gatherings. Four bedrooms including a spacious master suite with oversized bathroom and walk-in closet. Hardwood floors throughout. Large usable lot with multiple decks (beautiful sunsets included!). Prime location - just 3 minutes to 280 (Edgewood Road); 10 mins to 101 (Whipple Ave); 25 mins to San Francisco, San Jose, and the beach at Half Moon Bay; 10 mins to Stanford; adjacent to Edgewood Park - great hiking and open space - and close to some of the area's most popular cycling spots. Move in ready - a must see!

BasicDetails.Title: 1774 Stockbridge AVE
BasicDetails.Description: New construction, thoughtfully designed with acute attention to detail and livability. The living room with fireplace and dining room welcome you into the home with wide-plank European oak flooring abundant windows and natural light. Spectacular open concept kitchen, family and breakfast room. Chefs kitchen includes stone counter tops, two sinks, Sub Zero refrigerator, beverage center, six burner Wolf stove and more. Family room with fireplace opens to the beautifully landscaped yard. En suite downstairs bedroom, plus 4 upstairs bedrooms and powder room. The master suite has a vaulted ceiling, luxurious bath, walk-in closet and an additional closet.Top quality construction home, just a step away from Atherton, and close to downtown Menlo Park, Redwood City, with easy access to Hwy 101 and Hwy 280.

BasicDetails.Title: 84 Nora WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Stunning Mediterranean home with modern sophistication. Located in coveted West Atherton, this extraordinary property is a private oasis built in 2009 with exceptional attention to detail and quality. Vast entertaining spaces including a large formal dining room, living room with multiple French doors, vaulted ceiling and cast stone fireplace. Downstairs office with fireplace and built in bookcase and desk. Wonderful chef kitchen with top of the line appliances opening to the family room with vaulted ceiling, fireplace and views of the backyard with sparkling pool with retractable cover, patios, mature landscaping and vast lawns. Two first floor en suite bedrooms and four upstairs bedrooms including a luxurious master suite with fireplace, vaulted ceilings, two walk-in closets and views of the rear yard. One bedroom currently equipped as media room with built in components. Wonderful location just minutes to downtown Menlo Park and Palo Alto with easy access to Hwy 280 and Hwy 101.

BasicDetails.Title: 399 N Central AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Excellent location just a few short blocks to Downtown Campbell. units are both 2 bd 1 bath completely renovated with laundry. new plumbing, electrical, double pane windows, new roof etc. Back unit is month to month. Garage is shared with owner next door. each unit has 1 garage and there is a large storage room. Financials will be available next week.

BasicDetails.Title: 689 University DR
BasicDetails.Description: Fantastic location. Downtown, close to everything. 2 bedroom, 1 bath bungalow. Oversize lot. 2-car garage plus extra large for workshop or artist studio. Charming home.

BasicDetails.Title: 212 Eaton RD 26
BasicDetails.Description: Located in sought-after Baywood, this fabulous Mediterranean condominium is just blocks from downtown San Mateo. The 2BD/2BA home is flooded with natural light, cathedral ceilings, fine hardwood floors and a stunning remodeled kitchen. A delightful balcony, in-unit laundry, private 1-car garage & large storage room completes this wonderful home.

BasicDetails.Title: 2115 Redington RD
BasicDetails.Description: MINDFULLY MODERN LIVING... Tucked into a serene parcel in coveted Lower Hillsborough, this open and airy home invites a sense of inner calm. The home's expansive floorplan follows a simple flow. The main level offers living, dining, guest and work spaces while bedrooms are tucked onto the upper level. Floor-to-ceiling windows and sliding Shoji screens create privacy and light between rooms. A professionally equipped culinary kitchen offers high-grade appliances, and a sprawling great room is perfect for entertaining and family time. Windows in every room invite the natural outdoor landscape to become part of the interior. The outside is a natural haven, with understated gardens, birch, maple, redwood, pine and magnolia trees. The rear grounds invite warm and enjoyable gatherings with a large pool, spa and cabana with full bath and mini bar area. This PRIME location is close to downtown Burlingame, downtown San Mateo and major transportation routes.

BasicDetails.Title: 12590 Cambridge DR
BasicDetails.Description: Beautiful remodeled and expanded home in Prides Crossing with Cupertino Schools, Lynbrook High. Gourmet kitchen w/huge island, granite, hardwood, skylight, open to expanded family room overlooking rear yard, Impressive expanded master bedroom with walk-in closet and new marble bath and sliding door to rear yard. Remodeled marble hall bath. Huge 12,800 sq ft lot. Recently painted in and out. New roof, new fence, driveway widened for extra car.

BasicDetails.Title: 123 Madison AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Madison Place craftsman style home! LIKE BRAND NEW! Remodeled, new wood floors, carpet and paint! New appliances and cabinets in Kitchen with granite and stainless steel appliances. Very large Master suite with huge walk in closet and big Master Bath! Formal Dining room and Living room with fireplace and french style sliding doors to private patio in back. Balcony off Master too! High Ceilings! 2 Car garage! Close to Central Park and downtown San Mateo! Excellent Baywood Schools! Transportation and freeways convenient for commute.

BasicDetails.Title: 892 Rider AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Great investment opportunity, tenants would love to stay, or rent one and live in the other, Backyard patio and also side yard on premises

BasicDetails.Title: 234 Woodland WAY
BasicDetails.Description: Gorgeous, like new, spacious home! Remodeled and updated top to bottom with newer kitchen with granite counters and brand new appliances! Remodeled baths. New plumbing, electrical, heat & a/c ducting, paint, almost everything is new throughout! New flooring throughout most of the house. Great location in The Pines near Pinewood Park, the Great Mall, and Highway 880! Come see this beautiful home and make it yours! Enclosed patio room and remodeled full bath not included in the square footage or bathroom count! The home is actually a 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath!!

BasicDetails.Title: 2050 Brewster AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Located in the coveted Mt. Carmel neighborhood, this 1915 Craftsman has been exquisitely updated into a comfortable family home. Features: 3 Bed/2.5 Bath, 330sf covered front porch with swing seat ideal for evening cocktails, living/dining room w/9ft ceilings and gas fireplace, gourmet kitchen w/granite and s/steel appliances, custom cabinetry and stainless appliances, surround sound ceiling speakers in family room, plus an additional 190sf detached bonus room/study. Many original features including wood floors and plantation wood shutters throughout. Professionally well-established landscaped yards, fenced in back yard. Perfect for entertaining. One car Garage and large unfinished basement ideal for storage.No smokers and no pets. Close to Caltrain, Whole Foods, Down Town Redwood City, One Block from Stafford Park. Easy access to US 101 & 280 for Silicon Valley commute. Monthly Rent includes gardener.Tenant responsible for utilities.

BasicDetails.Title: 2190 Valleywood DR
BasicDetails.Description: Don't miss this beautiful "TURNKEY" completely renovated Rollingwood Gem with Bay views! Three bedrooms, two bathrooms plus two bonus rooms down. Freshly painted inside and out, brand new stainless steel kitchen appliances, beautiful marble counter tops, gorgeous newly refinished hardwood floors throughout, tastefully renovated bathrooms, new dual pane windows and doors, new water heater and much more. Conveniently located minutes from SF International, Interstates 280 & 101, BART, shopping, 15 minutes to metropolitan downtown SF and its diverse culture, 10 minutes to the Pacifica Ocean and sandy beaches.

BasicDetails.Title: 73 Watkins AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Brand new construction located on a charming tree lined street, this home features 5 bedrooms and 4 full baths. With approximately 2,580 sqft of refined living space on a 6,550 sqft lot with a spacious backyard and covered patio. High-end appliances, stylish fixtures, whole-house sound system, high quality workmanship and luxury finishes throughout. Top rated menlo schools.

BasicDetails.Title: 545 Palma ST
BasicDetails.Description: Picture yourself in the serene neighborhood of El Granada, walking distance to tranquil beaches, local coastal trails and the picturesque harbor. This beautiful home offers 2650 sq ft of living space and is situated on an oversized 7500 sq ft lot. Featuring 3 large bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, a formal living/dining room and spacious kitchen/ family room combo accessing a private rear yard and patio area. The light and bright eat-in kitchen offers newer appliances, built in pantry, overhead skylights and overlooks the patio and rear yard with mature plum, lemon and apple trees. The spacious master bedroom suite includes a Jacuzzi tub, two walk-in closets and private master bath. More features include: new front entryway stairs and deck, 2 wood burning fireplaces, built in cabinets and shelving, tile flooring and new carpets throughout. Additional Bonus room and basement storage area, each 900 sq ft MOL, both accessible by oversized two car garage. This home is a must see!

BasicDetails.Title: 2124 Sterling AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Lovingly cared for adorable ranch home located on one of the best streets west of Alameda de las Pulgas midway between Las Lomitas Elementary and La Entrada Middle schools | Formal entry leads to an enormous living room with wood burning fireplace | Elegant formal dining room | Sunny kitchen/family room leads to serene and private rear yard | Kitchen previously expanded to add family room, laundry and pantry | Spacious master bedroom has walk-in closet and partially upgraded master bath | Additional updates include vinyl clad windows and sliding door to deck leading to patio | Connected to the carport is a shed that can be entered from the rear yard | This is "good bones" home with exisiting charm that awaits the creativity of its new owner | Front and rear yards quite private | Starbucks - Salon - Barbershop - Yoga Studio - Plantation Cafe - Luttickan's - Dutch Goose - Lulu's - Flea Street Cafe just a few blocks away | Showings by appointment only

BasicDetails.Title: 6586 Springpath LN
BasicDetails.Description: Spacious Almaden Valley 4 bed 3 bath 2450 sq ft home built in 1978 now available!! Remodeled kitchen with new appliances and natural quartz counters overlooks large living area and out to entertainer's dream back yard! Sparkling fountain and pool surrounded by travertine patio. Covered hot tub and bbq area. 7739 sq ft lot backs to Almaden Winery/Quicksilver Park. Walk to park and trails. Close to shopping as well as great/easy commute location. Other interior features include master suite with vaulted ceilings. Enclosed deck are for additional space/office/exercise room etc. 3 car garage. New sod lawn and sprinkler system. Don't miss this fabulous home!!

BasicDetails.Title: 1010 Chula Vista AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Charming classic Burlingame Bungalow has 3 bedrooms 1 bathroom. Seller will do planned bath remodel and some kitchen updates for her cost, add $30,000 to list price -- by close of escrow, or take it as it is now and do it your way at listed price. Exquisite professionally landscaped gardens. 2 short blocks to Broadway. Won't last! Sale of property is subject to seller's offer on replacement home being accepted.

BasicDetails.Title: 855 Mosswood LN
BasicDetails.Description: Ranch style home in the sought after Millbrae Meadows neighborhood. This beautiful home features three bedrooms including master suite with newly remodeled bathroom, 2 full baths, Large living room with a double door entry , Beautifully remodeled kitchen with recessed lighting, garden window, classic white cabinets and access to the back patio. Family room/dining room combo with wood burning fireplace, large back patio and front courtyard. Tastefully updated with stone floors and carpet in the bedrooms. Two car garage, Award winning Millbrae school district with easy access to 280 & 101, close to shopping, parks and Millbrae library.

BasicDetails.Title: 251 Pinehurst AVE
BasicDetails.Description: Solid house in Los Gatos with walking distance to Alta Vista and Union school. Plantation shutters w/ double paned windows. Built in cabinets in living room w/ wood burning fireplace. Bosch electric cooktop. Bay window & skylight in kitchen brings in a lot of light. French doors open from the dining area into the private backyard. Many fruit trees like fuji apple, peach, and 2 fig trees. Ceiling fans in some of the bedrooms to keep the house cool. Some mirrored closet door lined with cedar in most of the closets. Easy access to shops and freeway. Close to the foothills. Broker tour 9/28 Open House 10/1 and 10/2

BasicDetails.Title: 1349 Joplin DR 4
BasicDetails.Description: Recently remodeled & affordable Condominium* Almaden Valley area * perfect for a first time Buyer or an Investor * two-bedroom* one-bath *private patio* Move-in ready* open floor plan with lots of natural light * Remodeled kitchen and bathroom with new tile floors* granite kitchen counters* stainless steel refrigerator * recessed lighting *dual pane windows* Pergo flooring * One car-port with ample storage* private laundry area for 4-units* Pet friendly* Lush green belt & 2 swimming pools in the complex* Convenient location near Westfield / Oakridge mall, Whole Foods & Almaden plaza* Easy access to Freeway 85 &87.

BasicDetails.Title: 5315 Mango Blossom CT
BasicDetails.Description: Ready to move into - remodeled home with gourmet kitchen, island with granite counter, custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, recessed lights. Bamboo hardwood floors, dual pane windows, plantation shutters. Both bathrooms remodeled with granite counters, Porcelanosa tiles in glass enclosed showers. Dual-flush toilets for water conservation. Fabulous back yard perfect for entertaining with in-ground heated pool (new pool pump/heater), outdoor lighting, retractable awning, tiki bar, lime tree. Professionally landscaped with attractive paving in front gives great curb appeal.
